description: See full results and maps from the Georgia Senate runoff election.
title: Georgia Runoff Results: Jon Ossoff Defeats David Perdue
title_page: Georgia Runoff Results: Jon Ossoff Defeats David Perdue - The New York Times
maintext: David Perdue, a Republican whose Senate term ended on Sunday, has faced a competitive challenge from Jon Ossoff, a documentary film executive. In November, Mr. Perdue fell just short of the majority he would have needed to avoid a runoff, winning 49.7 percent of the vote, while Mr. Ossoff had 47.9 percent â€” a difference of about 88,000 votes.
